sqlMap.sql: /* getChildNode */ SELECT A.c_id , A.c_parentid , A.c_position , A.c_left , A.c_right , A.c_level , A.c_title , A.c_type /* user filed add point*/
, ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 'InChild' ELSE 'NoChild' END AS YesNo /* inline table from filed add point*/
WHERE A.C_PARENTID = #c_id# ORDER BY A.C_POSITION ASC
sqlMap.select: /* getChildNodeByLeftRight */ SELECT C_ID , C_PARENTID , C_POSITION , C_LEFT , C_RIGHT , C_LEVEL , C_TITLE , C_TYPE FROM T_BOARD_COMMENT_TEST WHERE C_LEFT >= #c_left# AND C_RIGHT <= #c_right# ORDER BY C_LEFT ASC
/* searchNodeByString */ SELECT c_left , c_right FROM T_BOARD_COMMENT_TEST WHERE C_TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchStr#||'%'

/* searchNodeByPosition */ SELECT DISTINCT C_ID FROM T_BOARD_COMMENT_TEST WHERE 1=1
( C_LEFT <= #[].c_left# AND C_RIGHT >= #[].c_right# )
sqlMap.update: /* alterNode */ UPDATE T_BOARD_COMMENT_TEST SET C_TYPE = #c_type# , C_TITLE = #c_title# , C_ARTICLE_ID = #articleID# , C_ROOT_COMMENT_ID = #rootCommentID# , C_REG_ID = #regID# , C_VIEW_ONLY_REG_ID_FL = #viewOnlyRegIDFL# , C_IS_DELETED_FL = #isDeletedFL# , C_REG_DT = #regDT# , C_MOD_DT = #modDT# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
sqlMap.select: /* getNode */ SELECT C_ID , C_PARENTID , C_POSITION , C_LEFT , C_RIGHT , C_LEVEL , C_TITLE , C_TYPE , C_ARTICLE_ID as articleID , C_ROOT_COMMENT_ID as rootCommentID , C_REG_ID as regID , C_VIEW_ONLY_REG_ID_FL as viewOnlyRegIDFL , C_IS_DELETED_FL as isDeletedFL , C_REG_DT as regDT , C_MOD_DT as modDT FROM T_BOARD_COMMENT_TEST WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
/* getNodeByRef */ SELECT C_ID , C_PARENTID , C_POSITION , C_LEFT , C_RIGHT , C_LEVEL , C_TITLE , C_TYPE FROM T_BOARD_COMMENT_TEST WHERE C_ID = #ref#
sqlMap.delete: /* removeNode */ DELETE FROM T_BOARD_COMMENT_TEST WHERE C_LEFT >= #c_left# AND C_RIGHT <= #c_right#
sqlMap.update: /* removedAfterLeftFix */ UPDATE T_BOARD_COMMENT_TEST SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_LEFT > #c_right#
/* removedAfterRightFix */ UPDATE T_BOARD_COMMENT_TEST SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT > #c_left#
/* removedAfterPositionFix */ UPDATE T_BOARD_COMMENT_TEST SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION - 1 WHERE C_PARENTID = #c_parentid# AND C_POSITION > #c_position#
sqlMap.select: /* searchNodeByString */ SELECT C_LEFT FROM T_BOARD_COMMENT_TEST WHERE C_PARENTID = 0
sqlMap.update: /* cutMyselfPositionFix moveNode case. parameterClass is nodeById*/ UPDATE T_BOARD_COMMENT_TEST SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION - 1 WHERE C_PARENTID = #c_parentid# AND C_POSITION > #c_position#
/* cutMyselfLeftFix moveNode case. parameterClass is nodeById*/ UPDATE T_BOARD_COMMENT_TEST SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_LEFT > #c_right#

/* cutMyselfRightFix moveNode case. parameterClass is nodeById*/ UPDATE T_BOARD_COMMENT_TEST SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT > #c_left#
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#

/* stretchPositionForMyselfFromJstree */ UPDATE T_BOARD_COMMENT_TEST SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION + 1 WHERE C_PARENTID = #ref# AND C_POSITION >= #c_position#
AND C_ID NOT IN
(-1)
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#

/* stretchLeftForMyselfFromJstree */ UPDATE T_BOARD_COMMENT_TEST SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT + #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_LEFT >= #rightPositionFromNodeByRef#
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#

/* stretchRightForMyselfFromJstree */ UPDATE T_BOARD_COMMENT_TEST SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT + #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT >= #rightPositionFromNodeByRef#
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#
/* enterMyselfFixPosition */ UPDATE T_BOARD_COMMENT_TEST SET C_PARENTID = #ref# , C_POSITION = #c_position# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#

/* enterMyselfFixLeftRight */ UPDATE T_BOARD_COMMENT_TEST SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT - (#idif#) , C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT - (#idif#) , C_LEVEL = C_LEVEL - (#ldif#)
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#
sqlMap.insert:
/* addMyselfFromJstree */ INSERT INTO T_BOARD_COMMENT_TEST ( C_ID, C_PARENTID, C_POSITION, C_LEFT, C_RIGHT, C_LEVEL ) VALUES ( S_BOARD_COMMET_TEST.NEXTVAL, #c_parentid#, #c_position#, #c_left#, #c_right#, #c_level# )
/* addMyselfFromJstree SEQ */ SELECT S_BOARD_COMMET_TEST.CURRVAL AS SEQ FROM DUAL
sqlMap.update: /* alterNodeType */ UPDATE T_BOARD_COMMENT_TEST SET C_TYPE = #c_type# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
/* fixCopyIF */ UPDATE T_BOARD_COMMENT_TEST SET C_POSITION = #fixCopyPosition# WHERE C_ID = #fixCopyId#
/* fixCopy */ UPDATE T_BOARD_COMMENT_TEST SET C_PARENTID = #fixCopyId# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
/* updateCommentRootID */ UPDATE T_BOARD_COMMENT_TEST SET C_ROOT_COMMENT_ID = C_ID WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
sqlMap.select:
/* getCommentList */
, A.C_ARTICLE_ID as articleID , A.C_ROOT_COMMENT_ID as rootCommentID , A.C_REG_ID as regID , A.C_VIEW_ONLY_REG_ID_FL as viewOnlyRegIDFL , A.C_IS_DELETED_FL as isDeletedFL , A.C_REG_DT as regDT , A.C_MOD_DT as modDT , B.C_TITLE as regNickName FROM T_BOARD_COMMENT_TEST A, T_USER_INFO B WHERE 1=1 AND A.C_ARTICLE_ID = #articleID# AND A.C_REG_ID = B.C_ID ORDER BY A.C_ROOT_COMMENT_ID DESC, A.C_LEFT ASC
sqlMap.update: /* deleteComment */ UPDATE T_BOARD_COMMENT_TEST SET C_IS_DELETED_FL = '1' WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
